name: tabscript
description: Indentation-based TypeScript syntax for building clean DSLs with plugin support.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist dist-min ; tsc --target es2023 --module nodenext --moduleResolution nodenext --declaration --sourceMap --outDir dist src/*.ts && chmod a+x dist/cli.js && mkdir -p dist-min && for f in dist/*.js; do terser --module --mangle module --keep-fnames --source-map -o dist-min/$(basename $f) -- $f; done && cp dist/*.d.ts dist-min
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-extension
scripts.build-docs: npm run build && npx esbuild docs/custom.src.js --bundle --format=esm --minify --outfile=docs/custom.js && typedoc && rm -rf dist-docs/assets/tabscript && cp -r dist dist-docs/assets/tabscript && cp vscode-extension/syntaxes/tabscript.tmLanguage.json dist-docs/assets/tabscript/
scripts.watch: tsc --target es2023 --module nodenext --moduleResolution nodenext --declaration --sourceMap --outDir dist src/*.ts --watch
scripts.package-extension: npm run build-all && cd vscode-extension && vsce package
scripts.test: npm run test-ts && npm run test-js && npm run test-er && npm run test-markup && npm run test-log && npm run test-inspect && echo OK
scripts.prepack: npm run build && npm run test

author: Frank van Viegen
